Santa Claus:
Yes. The role of Santa has meaning for people who are full of love.
But if you find any "Ice Candy Pieces" while out hunting, please bring them to me. I had a hole in my bag of presents, and several "Ice Candy" gift boxes fell out.
I'm counting on you.
If you give me 50 pieces of the Ice Candy Pieces, I'll give you a fitting Christmas present.
